topic.title: Frac Excess Precip in SW in LAND_USE: Farm Process V4 Land Use Options Pane

para.text: Frac Excess Precip in SW in LAND_USE: Farm Process V4 Land Use Options Pane
Any precipitation not consumed by the crop becomes an inefficient loss. The inefficient loss becomes either runoff or deep percolation.

SURFACEWATER_LOSS_FRACTION_PRECIPITATION indicates the fraction of inefficient losses from precipitation that goes to surface water compared to deep percolation. (For example, 0.75 indicates 75% of unconsumed precipitation becomes surface runoff.)
